name: Home Run Derby: vs Fairy Tales
name_original: Home Run Derby: vs Fairy Tales
description:
Intense VR Home Run Derby Game Begins Here!
The pitchers you'll face are famous characters from fairy tales. They'll throw absurd and unpredictable magic pitches. Stay in the ultimate state of concentration, the "Zone," and hit home runs with precision!

*This game is recommended to be experienced in VR, but non-VR play is also supported (mouse & keyboard control).

Features

  • Only Home Runs Matter:
    You should aim for nothing but home runs. Anything else is just a mistake.
  • Unreasonable Magic Pitches:
    The fairy tale characters show no mercy. Challenge yourself with extreme difficulty.
  • Enter the Zone:
    By focusing your concentration to the extreme, time will feel slower. Enter the Zone and face the magic pitches.
  • Varied Bats and Growth Elements:
    By using the money earned in the Home Run Derby, you can buy bats and items that will greatly enhance your hitting abilities.
  • Ideal for Live Streaming:
    You can display the Live Chat that is being broadcast in-game!　Let the whole world see your courage and have a great time!

Notes

If you enjoy the challenge of unreasonable difficulties, try clearing the game without using the Zone.

Synopsis

Once upon a time, in a certain place...
